ai.summary: Manse Lane is a short, easy 0.3 km walk in the UK, suitable for beginners and those seeking a quick outdoor outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with a well-maintained surface along a rural lane; expect light pedestrian traffic and typical countryside views.
ai.safety_notes: Even on a short lane, stay aware of any passing vehicles; wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing; check forecast and daylight hours before heading out; bring a charged phone for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Phone with map or offline directions
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with spring and autumn offering the best weather and scenery; winter walks are possible with proper footwear and visibility, while summer can be warm.

seo.title: Manse Lane – Easy 0.3 km UK Walk
seo.meta_description: A quick and easy 0.3 km walk along Manse Lane in the UK. Perfect for beginners and casual walkers seeking a brief outdoor outing.
